amendment.description: To increase funding for the Paul and Sheila Wellstone Center for Community Building.

vote.text: Amendment SA 6 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 6 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Coleman. (consideration: CR S1427-1429) To increase funding for the Paul and Sheila Wellstone Center for Community Building.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 6 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 6 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Coleman.
